ygData.subject: RE: Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: Where do the bracers of vox come from? ... From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 2:11 PM To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Where do the bracers of vox come from?

-----Original Message-----
From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 2:11 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re:[EQ-Monks] Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons


From: Worlord <worlord99@...>

Resistance Jewelry

Fire:

+10 vs Fire Rings/4 AC

1 Platinum Bar
1 Emerald

+6 vs Fire Bracers/3 AC

1 Bar Gold
1 Emerald

+7 vs Fire Necklace

1 Bar Gold
1 Hematite

Cold:

+7 vs Cold Bracer

1 Platinum Bar
1 Turquoise

or +6 vs Cold/4 AC Bracers

1 Gold Bar
1 Peridot

+10 vs Cold/4 AC rings

1 Platinum Bar
1 Peridot

Some others off top of my head are Vox Bracers (+7)
Froglock Crown (+20 each)

Hope it Helps

Hammeron
